section.name: Summary

tr.td: the MIME type of the file, for example text/plain, text/csv, application/pdf, etc.

the proposed filename for the object. When set, a "Save File" dialog will typically be displayed, though this is ultimately up to the browser. If not set, the content will typically be displayed inline in the browser if possible.

the method that will be used to download the file contents. The method takes two arguments, a FacesContext and an OutputStream. The OutputStream will be automatically closed, so the sole responsibility of this method is to write all bytes to the OutputStream.
